title: Modern World Newspaper App
description: A minimalist web application mimicking a classical newspaper using MySQL and PHP backend. The design differentiates each section with font-weight and color styling as I was limited to only using Black, White and Grey.

design_process.research: Analyzed various newspaper websites to identify layout patterns and fonts that are associated with traditional journalism. Focused on simple navigation and clear section divisions.

wireframes.caption: I took a lot of inspiration from broadsheets to help distinguish sections as I had a limited palette to work with.
This was a take more akin to digital newspapers, with a more modern layout. I wanted to see how the design would look if I had more colors to work with.

design_process.ui_design: Minimalist design with clear typography. Colors are muted to provide an old-school feel. Fonts were carefully selected to match a classic newspaper look.
design_process.development: Implemented using PHP for the backend with a MySQL database. Responsive design was ensured using CSS Grid and Flexbox.
design_process.testing: Tested responsiveness on multiple devices. Focused on ensuring content layout was readable on both desktop and mobile.

title: Lora Fullstack Mobile App
description: A React Native mobile app that displays generated content via an API. It uses AppWrite as the backend and integrates NativeWind for seamless styling.

design_process.research: Studied existing mobile apps in the movie and content generation space. Focused on creating a simple, engaging user interface.

wireframes.caption: Initial wireframe of the landing page

design_process.ui_design: The app uses a minimalistic color palette with emphasis on content, designed to engage users with smooth animations and transitions.
design_process.development: Used React Native and Expo for mobile development. Integrated AppWrite to handle the backend services like authentication and data storage. NativeWind enabled styling that seamlessly integrates with React Native components.
design_process.testing: Ensured the app performed well across various devices, optimized for both Android and iOS. Focused on smooth UI transitions and error-free data fetching from the API.

title: Beer Pairing App
description: An AI-powered beer pairing app using OpenFoodFacts API and React Native. AI suggests beer pairings, and a chatbot customizes the experience.

design_process.research: Analyzed existing food pairing apps and focused on AI-enhanced experiences. Wanted to make the app both fun and informative.

wireframes.caption: Initial wireframe of signup, login and welcome page
Initial wireframe of homepage, profile and search

design_process.ui_design: Used vibrant colors to match the fun and lighthearted theme of beer pairing. The chatbot design is interactive and designed to simulate a conversational experience.
design_process.development: React Native was used for development, integrating AI APIs to suggest beers and handle user interactions via chatbot. OpenFoodFacts API was used for the beer data.
design_process.testing: Tested with a small user group to refine the chatbot responses and ensure API calls were efficient. Focused on making sure pairing suggestions were accurate and fun.

title: Astronaut in Space on Demand Color Mixing
description: A 3D project using Three.js to create a 3D astronaut in space, allowing on-demand color mixing with interactive elements.

design_process.research: Studied space-themed visuals to ensure realistic textures and models. Wanted to create a visual experience that was both interactive and engaging.

wireframes.caption: Initial wireframe layout for the interactive space scene

design_process.ui_design: Focused on the visual experience of space with a clean and simple design to highlight the astronaut and the background. Colors are chosen to represent different space environments.
design_process.development: Used Three.js for the 3D model and animation. Integrated JavaScript to allow users to mix colors interactively, offering a fun, personalized experience.
design_process.testing: Tested performance on different browsers and devices. Focused on ensuring smooth animations and responsive design.
